title: L'Ardoisière
content:
I designed this for a friend of mine. Translated it means the slate place. The company sells high end slate. Hopefully this will make a nice mark for them.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120515180717im_/http:/typophile.com/files/L-Ardoisiere_4634.jpg)

Cheers,

Charles Borges de Oliveira

[www.borgeslettering.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20120515180717/http:/www.borgeslettering.com/ "www.borgeslettering.com")
author: Charles_borges_...

comments.content:
This looks nice! I'm so into that swash on the d.  
The first thing I notice is how straight and mechanical the underlines are. They are perfect and flat while the type is flowing and slants up a little (look at the space below the rs).  
The two minor things I also notice are the fine line on the stem of the L looks a little thick and not quite right yet. And the bottom of the d, where the stem turns into the tail, looks a little heavy. It might be nice to play with making the thin upstroke of the bowl build into the stem.  
Nice work.
